txt.en:
'Our preparations are complete, thanks to you. Will you come with us to the Fords?

'Ah, but nay...you have your own tasks to be about...perhaps we will meet again, provided we survive the confrontation with Saruman.

'Farewell, friend [placeholder]!'
The Riders Four are in Edoras.\n\nBurnoth asked you aid him and his Riders as they prepare to depart Edoras.
Bring the supplies you collected to Burnoth
'Aye, this will do, my friend. There is still much to be done, however. You should speak with Hutha, Ulf, and Léofdag and see what tasks they might have for you.'
'Are you certain that you collected all of the supplies I requested?'
The Riders Four, delayed in their journey from Eaworth, arrived at Edoras too late to join Théoden's muster and now prepare to follow behind.
'Are the preparations complete? We must ride at once if we are to overtake Théoden King's army!'

'Ah, [placeholder], I see that you arrived before us. We were delayed as we rode from Entwash Vale; however, that may prove a boon. Had we delivered our warning regarding the Easterlings in the north, Théoden King may have been distracted from the greater threat: Saruman.\n\n'We understand that he has ridden forth to the Fords of Isen...we make ready to follow behind. Would you aid us in our preparations? There is little time, and much to do. We need provisions and medicine for the journey...would you seek these things throughout the city and bring them here to me? We need dried meat, vegetables, water, medicine, and bandages.'
Hutha, Ulf, and Léofdag are in Edoras.\n\nBurnoth asked you to help his Riders complete their preparations as well.
Burnoth is in Edoras.\n\nYou should return to Burnoth and let him know that you have done as he has asked.
Burnoth is in Edoras.\n\nYou should return to Burnoth and give him the supplies he requested.
